entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Build Analysis" report is missing a build break in a test #84049
    8.0.0
  • Add tests for downgrading assembly resolution via resolution extensions #84039
    8.0.0
  • VersionConverter throws NullReferenceException if Version is null #84037
  • Cannot enumerate VS workloads on ARM64 (exception in `dotnet --info`) #84033
  • Determine behavior for GeneratedComClass on a type with no GeneratedComInterface interfaces #84032
  • Process memory and the memory snapshot are not equal #84035
    Future
  • Consider expanding casts in late phases #84025
    Future
  • Test and verify OpenSSL 3.1 support #84021
  • Support top-level populate methods for JSON (patch) #84018
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndClear<Int32> #84029
    8.0.0
  • Size saving opportunity for System.Text.Json generators with custom converters #84015
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM CultureInfo names returns locale #84016
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeInitialization\\CctorsWithSideEffects\\CctorForWrite\\CctorForWrite.cmd #84007
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/2164/foreground-shutdown/foreground-shutdown.cmd #84006

Closed

  • [jitosr_stress_random] Failures in System.Text related tests #83959
    8.0.0
  • [pgostress] fullpgo_random_gdv_edge failures in JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988 #83960
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Networking and Security tests fail on spanish servers: There are no more endpoints available in the endpoint mapper #83226
    7.0.x
  • [bug] dotnet warns CA1416 even though TargetFramework is Windows #76824
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 29 Regressions on 12/2/2022 1:56:04 AM #79336
  • [API Proposal]: Add "poll" object #83989
  • Test failure System.Tests.StringTests.IndexOf_SingleLetter on osx-x64 Debug #84010
    8.0.0
  • Consider shipping Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility with every servicing release #77557
  • Make .NET Framework and .NET Standard facade changes trackable #65997
    8.0.0
  • [cecil] TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #83991
  • Arm64 tests are not run as part of CI #83947
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #71070
    8.0.0
  • [perf] RSA is significantly slower than RSACryptoServiceProvider when verifying data #83994
  • CI failure STRICT_JS doesn't work with MODULARIZE or EXPORT_ES6 #83986
  • Question/issue about GT_COMMA on rhs of GT_ASG. #1699
    Future
  • [wasm] crash instead of nullref caused by null check elimination #83941
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: File.ReadLines增加支持读写的打开方式，很多时候在打开的同时还有应用在写入，避免占用报错 #82152
  • JsonConverter<decimal> rounds number, even after overriding Write(...) method in custom converter #81825

PullRequests

Created

  • offers to start and stop IHostedService concurrently #84048
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Coalesce identical constant WordCategories #84047
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use timeouts in 2 socket test cases #84030
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#80581) #84028
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-Build-mono
  • Streamline a few members of char #84024
    area-System.Runtime
  • Revert #80698 and obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #84022
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix AREA alignment warning on Windows ARM64 #84020
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Enabled Sqrt and Abs intrinsics #84011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify multiply and divide for mini JIT on ARM64 #84004
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: small OSR locals must be normalize on load #84000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix precondition if HOST_UNIX in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #84023
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restore original stack ref enumeration behavior #84034
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [6.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83748
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83747
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Create action to check service label #84045
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix service label action #84046
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use bit mask in Regex's IsWordChar #84003
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update check-service-labels.yml #84044
    needs-area-label
  • Fix piping in yml #84042
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] Create action to check servicing label #84041
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Create action to check servicing label #84038
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Libraries area pod updates for March 2023, plus some fabricbot maintenance #83897
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [6.0] Update backport template and servicing docs #84008
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure that CONTEXT_XStateFeaturesMask is explicitly zeroed out on RtlCaptureContext #84012
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Initial changes for globalization hybrid mode #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [7.0] Update backport template and servicing docs #84005
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update backport template and servicing docs #83795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility from runtime #84013
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check in shim typeforwards and remove the dependency on the underlying targeting packs #79147
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Renable running Arm64 test cases in CI #83948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use docker images with emscripten 3.1.30 #84014
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83834
  • Fix infinite timeout passed to CancellationTokenSource.CancelAfter #84009
    area-System.Threading
  • Enable regex source gen / compiler vectorization of all sets #83992
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Allow forward substituting small-typed nodes #83969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Mark the windows runtime packs workload as abstract #83230
    area-Build-mono
  • Add osx-arm64 for coreclr packages. #84001
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Extend mstat format with information that maps to dependency nodes #83578
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix the removal of relations added by basic blocks. #83943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #83557
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83728
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Disable more unsupported runtime tests #83731
    Servicing-approved
  • Unroll SequenceEqual(ref byte, ref byte, nuint) in JIT #83945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 6.0.17
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.17
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83966
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #83957
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83602
    area-System.Net, test-bug, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [WIP] RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Set minimum language version allowed by config binding generator #83996
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ConvertIcuTimeFormatString: convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces too. #83589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-order some blocks in runtimelookup #83453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Implement the STJ.UseReflectionDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Drop extra files from ReferenceCopyLocalPaths #83670
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Use similar types for self-referential generics instead of the exact canonical type #83995
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow up on failing WASM AOT tests #31491
  • GenAPI filters out generic interfaces for implementations #31484

Closed

  • `--self-contained false` is ignored when `PublishNativeAot=true` #31477
  • Unable to run SDK on Docker with file size limit set #31457

PullRequests

Created

  • Wasm SDK code owners #31489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using built-in package for package reference to `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` #31488
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix `publish --self-contained` for Blazor builds. #30700
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update off-by-default analyzers to account for rename #31460
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2145921 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • Enable containers publishing #31432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False-positive for IDE0251 Make member readonly #67531
  • /pathmap to root broken in .csproj when path has a space in it. #67528
  • CS8063 - Improve wording #67525
  • Assert failures handling DynamicObjectCreationExpression in GetValEscape() and CheckValEscape() #67518
  • Formatter doesn't work correctly with nested list patterns #67516
  • Remove locking from ProjectSystemProjectFactory (and use Workspace's lock instead). #67510

Closed

  • Either change nameof or change the warning rules #67526
  • Roslyn 4.5 does not enable DiagnosticAnalyzers via the ruleset file anymore #67211
  • Crash in compiler while editing in roslyn. #66960
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67532
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part2) #67524
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove code for 'push' diagnostic tagging #67505
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure ability to customize the HtmlEncoder used for the RazorComponentEndpoint #47477
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HttpContext.Session.GetString is Always Return Null in .NET Core 6 #47476
  • System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException when moving grpc server to dotnet 8 #47475
  • [Blazor] DotnetStreams bug #47473
  • Onboard aspnetcore into the new TimeProvider type from runtime #47472
    .NET 8.0
  • [ASPNET Core 2.1] src\SignalR\clients\csharp\Http.Connections.Client\src\HttpConnection.cs should null check logging scope before disposing #47470
  • Blazor - JavaScript interop returns the wrong values for some types in production builds #47468
  • Please consider Extensions to Blazor WASM elements? #47466
  • Consider changing AlphaRouteConstraint to use IndexOfAnyValues instead of Regex #47463
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Build error when using RDG with a route handler that returns a type explicitly implementing IResult #47462
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Using 3rd-party identity providers is simple ... until you need auth for Swagger😱 or need to write a client #47461
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Analyzer] Prefer HttpRequest.ReadFormAsync over HttpRequest.Form #47460
  • Replace QueryStringEnumerable.SpanHelper with MemoryExtensions.Replace #47457
  • Rate Limiting - Ability to consume a variable amount of tokens per request #47456

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #47446
  • img decoding="async" with blazor #47449
  • DeveloperExceptionPage showing and disappearing fast #46859
  • AzureADB2C.UI v7 release #47458
  • Renaming component breaks css isolation #47270
  • IJSObjectReference module import path error #47430
  • Incorrect results of RangeAttribute #47434
  • How to paramterise a partial containing 'expression names'? #45845
  • dotnet new mvc with -rrc -f net7.0 can't work #47429
  • [Analyzer] Warn about `HttpRequest.Form` #44390
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Is it possible to use PKCE - Proof Key for Code Exchange on Azure AD App Registration + Blazor Server ? How to do it? #43668
  • select component value becomes null on change when having a CascadingParameter parameter #41453
  • Perf workflow tool #15241

PullRequests

Created

  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc
  • Null check nullable Scope before disposing in SignalR HttpConnection.cs #47471
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 2.1.x
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #47459
    Perf, area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • Bump okhttp to 4.10.0 #47455
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Create Linux-Musl Redistributable Artifacts #47451
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Update SDK #47441
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Clean up unnecessary suppressions #47440
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Use Json TypeInfoResolverChain #47450
    area-web-frameworks
  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Bump gson to 2.8.9. #47453
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0
  • Debugging a self-contained app locks its mscordbi.dll #3081
    Future

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need the option to disable XAML source gen, this is necessary for native embedding of .NET MAUI on WinUI 3 #14247
  • Microsoft.Maui.Media.mediapicker is asking permission 2 times only in android, iOS working fine #14244
    Backlog
  • CharacterSpacing Causes Button Layout to be Incorrect #14243
    Backlog
  • [android] Border's children disappear in dotnet/maui/main? #14239
    Backlog
  • ListView command hides cells' content #14234
  • CollectionView with vertical GridItemsLayout uses incorrect Span on Windows #14228
  • Maui Performance Issues #14227
    Backlog
  • CollectionView+FormattedString Poor Performance #14222

Closed

  • add documentation for taking VS-generated default Maui project nad debugging with local Maui build #6218
  • Label rendered differently when using <Span> and FontAttributes="Bold" #7341
  • Control event propagation? #7332
  • Improve template build with Arcade Templating MSBuild tasks #5101
  • DisplayAlert popup on multiple open windows #10026
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS only SocketException No route to host #14224
  • error NETSDK1139: The target platform identifier tizen was not recognized. #14206
  • Custom controls using handlers in MAUI app targetting .net7 not working #14213
  • XAML changes not automatically updating as expected #13566

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into net8.0 #14246
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
  • [Android] Changes to propagate touch event with Frame #14230
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame

Merged

  • Fix firing modal from appearing ios14 #14240
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #14242
  • [Windows] Display alerts by Window #14229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [net8.0] Update Tizen packages #14225
    platform/tizen
  • Add permissions to the rebase action #14238
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Create a Rebase PR bot #14237
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [android] update gradle from 7.0.2 to 7.2 #14221
  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #14183
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • RadioButton Default Template Fill Theme Fix and new Theme Colors for Samples app #14117
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Updated

  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006
    area/shell 🐢
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #14218
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14215
    area/templates 📄
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Code generation now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OwnsMany generates multiple delete statements instead of a single SQL statement (EF Core 7.0.4) #30590
  • EFCore 7 get errors when try to query a `ToJson` column #30589

Closed

  • JSON Column nullable #29838

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression #30591
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30537
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.12 to 8.1.0 #30585
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Fix to #30565 - Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30568
  • [release/7.x] Fixes around IncludeExpression for ExecuteUpdate/Delete (#30571) #30579
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [ARM64] With NET7 RC1 installed, some files in the .exe installer and the .zip package are not identical #14279

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update deployment-tools dependency #15935
  • Assume recursive installer sync when no `vmr-sync.sh` arguments #15854
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Fix Ubuntu 20.04 artifact name in SDK diffing pipeline #15942
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Clean n-1 SBRP packages after building SBRP #15898
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Update SB prebuilts tarball version #15936

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Add alpine to CI for source-build #13074
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15934
